items.sentence: You\'re a bit shorter than Tom is, aren\'t you?
This science-fiction novel is very interesting.
Tom said he wasn\'t interested in meeting Mary.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t want to see her again.
Tom told Mary he\'d never been to a nude beach.
Tom told me that he didn\'t see anyone come in.
I think I know what you\'re trying to tell Tom.
I think I understand what Tom\'s trying to say.
I think I\'ll stay here for a few more minutes.
I never understood why Tom didn\'t like Boston.
I normally don\'t make these kinds of mistakes.
Tom is still interested in buying your old car.
Tom is still just as friendly as he used to be.
Tom is still just as handsome as he used to be.
I know you\'ve got more important things to do.
Have you studied Darwin\'s theory of evolution?
This is my first time to try doing it this way.
This is one of the best schools in the country.
This photo was taken in Boston three years ago.
I suppose I\'d do the same thing if I were you.
